name: Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association
membership: SIFMA is a member of the Global Financial Markets Association (GFMA) and International Council of Securities Associations (ICSA).
goal: SIFMA is the leading trade association representing the broker-dealers, banks and asset managers who provide access to the global capital markets. We serve our members as the principal advocate before policymakers, regulators, the media and the public on all matters involving the retail and institutional capital markets. We are the go-to resource for expert information about the capital markets and a forum for industry policy and professional development.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Capital standards
G-20/regulatory coordination
Securities regulation
Trade
UK withdrawal from the European Union
EU/US Joint Financial Regulatory Forum
MiFID II
GDPR
